question: 雑巾
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>miscellaneous</kanji> <kanji>cloth</kanji> is a <vocabulary>dust cloth</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>house cloth</vocabulary>. It's just a cloth that you use on random things.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading of <ja>雑</ja> is different from what you've learned. Instead of <ja>ざつ</ja> it's <ja>ぞう</ja>. Just imagine using this <vocabulary>dust cloth</vocabulary> to wipe down a <ja><reading>象</reading></ja> (<ja>ぞう</ja>). Its trunk is particularly dusty.
